channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsline Asia 24
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.title: Newsline Asia 24
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
channel.desc: Mt. Fuji is known for its repeated eruptions. After 300 years of silence, we can expect another eruption that could cause major damage to Tokyo. Learn how to protect yourself from volcanic disasters.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Medical Frontiers
channel.desc: In Japan, researchers are gathering scientific evidence on the effects of acupuncture and moxibustion. We examine how they improve stroke aftereffects, atopic dermatitis and other issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Journeys In Japan
channel.desc: Photographer Alfie Goodrich trains his lens on the exotic flowers of subtropical Okinawa. He discovers warm people who have forged a lifestyle deeply connected to nature.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: In 2023, Nagayama Yuko won the prestigious iF Design Award in Retail Architecture for one of her store designs. Highly acclaimed for her use of light, she shares her thoughts on architecture.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Passing The Torch Of Peace
channel.desc: A Hiroshima teen and an atomic bomb survivor try to depict visually what one mother endured immediately after the blast - her agony, sacrifice, and love - so that her tragic story is not repeated.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dig More Japan
channel.desc: Japanese fashion is embracing sustainable ideas and new forms of individual expression. I'm George Williams-come along with me as we dig a little deeper.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Passing The Torch Of Peace
channel.desc: A German playwright finds inspiration in a piano that survived the atomic bombing and its owner, who died after the blast at the age of 19, to create a piece warning against war's impact on the young.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life: Good Or Evil Soul
channel.desc: We visit the Yoshiwara district, Edo's most prominent pleasure quarters. Among the lavish spenders, courtesans and apprentices, small humanoid creatures scurry about - what could they be up to.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Document 72 Hours
channel.desc: Iwagi, an island in the Seto Inland Sea, is home to some 4,000 sakura trees. Each spring, visitors and locals alike gather to enjoy the cherry blossoms. Join us as we explore an island in full bloom.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Science View
channel.desc: Octopuses are smart, and can perceive textures and shapes with their arms. We'll explore octopuses and the nature of intelligence, and new bio-robots that combine living tissues with machines.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Journeys In Japan
channel.desc: Photographer Alfie Goodrich trains his lens on the exotic flowers of subtropical Okinawa. He discovers warm people who have forged a lifestyle deeply connected to nature.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dining With The Chef
channel.desc: Yakisoba: Japanese fried noodles. Chef Rika shows us an original recipe with shredded cabbage and a thin omelette, and introduces an authentic recipe from a yakisoba restaurant in Tokyo. Let's dig in.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Deeper Look
channel.desc: An experienced anchor Del Irani has a cutting-edge dialogue with a first-class guest on a current-affairs topics.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dining With The Chef Mini
channel.desc: Featured recipe: Ginger Chicken Wings/ Learn about easy, delicious, and healthy cooking with Chef Rika in five minutes.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan's Top Inventions
channel.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter.This time: motorized conveyor rollers.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Frontrunners
channel.desc: Taira Yuiko promotes composting of food waste to create a sustainable cycle. She works with an NGO in Mongolia to form a local nutrient cycle, enriching the soil and teaching composting techniques.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Science View
channel.desc: Octopuses are smart, and can perceive textures and shapes with their arms. We'll explore octopuses and the nature of intelligence, and new bio-robots that combine living tissues with machines.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Kabuki Kool
channel.desc: This time, a fantastic dance play "The Snowbound Barrier" from the 18th c. with an ambitious villain defeated by the spirit of the cherry tree in the form of a beautiful woman.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dive In Tokyo
channel.desc: Nishi-Ogikubo is an eclectic town on the western edge of central Tokyo. Join us as we learn about its roots as a farming area and trace its evolution into a cozy neighborhood of small businesses.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Direct and in-depth. Interviews exploring the minds and motivations of the leaders, visionaries, artists and entrepreneurs who are changing our world.

channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a variety of short programs focusing on Japan and Asia.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life: A Secret Date
channel.desc: It's late at night, when all are fast asleep. A young man and woman huddle together along the veranda outside of a house, attending to a ... rooster. What could the pair be up to.

channel.title: Direct Talk

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan's Top Inventions
channel.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter.This time: motorized conveyor rollers.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Mimaki Toshiyuki is co-chair of Nihon Hidankyo, winner of the 2024 Nobel Peace Prize. He talks about surviving the Hiroshima bombing and the group's work to achieve a world without nuclear weapons.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Message To The Future, Connecting Through The Power Of Song
channel.desc: NHK Hiroshima's theme song by PORNOGRAFFITTI, marking 80 years since the city was atomic bombed. Full of wishes and prayers for peace, it depicts a streetcar that ran three days after the bombing.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Biz Stream
channel.desc: This upbeat program combines business and economic news with in-depth feature stories that give you a closer look at the latest trends within Japan and around the world.

channel.title: Message To The Future, Connecting Through The Power Of Song
channel.desc: NHK Hiroshima's theme song by PORNOGRAFFITTI, marking 80 years since the city was atomic bombed. Full of wishes and prayers for peace, it depicts a streetcar that ran three days after the bombing.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japanology Plus
channel.desc: One of the world's top three production centers for eyeglasses is Sabae, in Fukui Prefecture. We trace the history of Japanese glasses, from the earliest examples to cutting-edge technology.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo
channel.desc: Japanese garlic is big, with sweetness and umami. In Aomori, we explore what makes it special, take a closer look at black garlic, and sample all kinds of dishes that show off garlic's potential.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Lunch On!
channel.desc: More than just a meal! Enjoy lunch around Japan, learning about peoples' lives and work-places and the stories behind workers' daily meals.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Core Kyoto
channel.desc: In 1869, the emperor's move to Tokyo led Kyoto's economy and population into decline. A canal was dug as a last resort to revive the city. It still supplies water, generates power and boosts tourism.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan In Focus
channel.desc: What if this was the final lesson you would ever teach? Atomic bomb survivor and former teacher Kajiya Fumiaki, age 85, prepares one last lesson for the children of an Osaka elementary school.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life: A Spring Party
channel.desc: We visit one of the most famous cherry blossom spots in Edo. Flower viewing parties were for eating, drinking and making merry. It was also an opportunity for young men and women to mingle.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan In Focus
channel.desc: What if this was the final lesson you would ever teach? Atomic bomb survivor and former teacher Kajiya Fumiaki, age 85, prepares one last lesson for the children of an Osaka elementary school.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Message To The Future, Connecting Through The Power Of Song
channel.desc: NHK Hiroshima's theme song by PORNOGRAFFITTI, marking 80 years since the city was atomic bombed. Full of wishes and prayers for peace, it depicts a streetcar that ran three days after the bombing.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Fukushima-based poet Wago Ryoichi, who experienced the 2011 Tohoku earthquake, has received international acclaim for his collection about his disaster-stricken hometown. He talks about his poetry.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Seasons Of Yamato
channel.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hometown Stories
channel.desc: Kiriake Chieko helped cremate schoolmates after the atomic bombing in Hiroshima. At 95, as the oldest surviving witness, she continues to give her testimony, urging people to hold on dearly to peace.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japanology Plus
channel.desc: One of the world's top three production centers for eyeglasses is Sabae, in Fukui Prefecture. We trace the history of Japanese glasses, from the earliest examples to cutting-edge technology.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan Railway Journal
channel.desc: In June 2024, Torizuka Akira became Oigawa Railway's new president. With half the line still closed due to typhoon damage, see how the company is striving to recover.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Core Kyoto
channel.desc: In 1869, the emperor's move to Tokyo led Kyoto's economy and population into decline. A canal was dug as a last resort to revive the city. It still supplies water, generates power and boosts tourism.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Passing The Torch Of Peace
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a variety of short programs focusing on Japan and Asia.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Chatroom Japan
channel.desc: Chatroom Japan puts a spotlight on our diverse international community. We report on the issues, speak to those involved, and get a fresh look at what it's like to live in Japan.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Three Crows Of Nagasaki: Honoring The Memories Of Friends
channel.desc: Keiho Junior High School in Nagasaki lost 400 lives to an atomic bomb. Three old core members of the alumni association explore the future of the memorial service, held annually for the past 50 years.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Special Program
channel.desc: * Broadcast only --- A wide range of topics featuring Japanese culture and society are introduced.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design ? Stories
channel.desc: Today's theme: Design Hunting in Osaka. A thriving trade and economic hub with a unique culture. Join us on a hunt for regional designs that prioritize human connection in the welcoming city of Osaka.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Asia Insight
channel.desc: Many Mongolian children dream of changing their family's lives by becoming a pro sumo wrestler in Japan. We meet the members of a school sumo club as they prepare for a national tournament.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Frontrunners
channel.desc: Taira Yuiko promotes composting of food waste to create a sustainable cycle. She works with an NGO in Mongolia to form a local nutrient cycle, enriching the soil and teaching composting techniques.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Three Crows Of Nagasaki: Honoring The Memories Of Friends
channel.desc: Keiho Junior High School in Nagasaki lost 400 lives to an atomic bomb. Three old core members of the alumni association explore the future of the memorial service, held annually for the past 50 years.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Enami Noriyuki won the coveted Double Gold Award at the world's most prestigious marmalade-making competition in 2020 and 2022. He talks about the secrets of his craft and his tumultuous journey.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Beauty Of Japanese Swords: Famous Masterpieces
channel.desc: Japanese swords, admired since ancient times for their beauty, are amazing works of art. This time, Odachi, a giant sword that showcases a swordsmith's astonishing expertise.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Medical Frontiers
channel.desc: In Japan, researchers are gathering scientific evidence on the effects of acupuncture and moxibustion. We examine how they improve stroke aftereffects, atopic dermatitis and other issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Amami: Island Colors
channel.desc: Experience the colors of Amami Oshima in beautiful time-lapse footage. Unique hues include "Amami Blue" ocean waters and the glossy black of silk thread that's painstakingly dyed using wood and mud.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Chatroom Japan
channel.desc: A pledge in Hiroshima's Peace Memorial Park caused a stir when it was unveiled in the years after the atomic bombing. In our war-torn world, it still raises the question: Who do you think "we"are.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japanology Plus Mini
channel.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at tatami mats: a quintessentially Japanese flooring material.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design ? Stories
channel.desc: Today's theme: Design Hunting in Osaka. A thriving trade and economic hub with a unique culture. Join us on a hunt for regional designs that prioritize human connection in the welcoming city of Osaka.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Story Land
channel.desc: Leading actors take turns as solo storytellers to act and recite traditional folk tales loved in Japan for centuries. Watch out, too, for the delightful illustrations.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time And Tide
channel.desc: Okayama Castle is unique and puzzles visitors. The keep shows a different face, depending on the direction, and each floor is a different shape. We look at how this mysterious castle was built.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
channel.desc: Can typhoons be controlled? A national project explores solutions using ships and artificial clouds.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Amami: Island Colors
channel.desc: Experience the colors of Amami Oshima in beautiful time-lapse footage. Unique hues include "Amami Blue" ocean waters and the glossy black of silk thread that's painstakingly dyed using wood and mud.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Chatroom Japan
channel.desc: A pledge in Hiroshima's Peace Memorial Park caused a stir when it was unveiled in the years after the atomic bombing. In our war-torn world, it still raises the question: Who do you think "we"are.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: My Street Piano
channel.desc: On a shopping street in front of Kagoshima Chuo Station sits Japan' s original street piano, which passersby love to visit and play from the heart.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design ? Stories
channel.desc: Today's theme: Design Hunting in Osaka. A thriving trade and economic hub with a unique culture. Join us on a hunt for regional designs that prioritize human connection in the welcoming city of Osaka.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Story Land
channel.desc: Leading actors take turns as solo storytellers to act and recite traditional folk tales loved in Japan for centuries. Watch out, too, for the delightful illustrations.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Train Cruise
channel.desc: In 1945 at the end of WWII, an atomic bomb hit Nagasaki. We enjoy the stunning scenery, but more importantly we talk with those who survived and remember those who lost their lives.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
channel.desc: Can typhoons be controlled? A national project explores solutions using ships and artificial clouds.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Journey
channel.desc: Nikko, in Tochigi Prefecture, is home to much natural beauty with its great mountains and lakes. The ornate Nikko Toshogu Shrine is famous. See the widely beloved Nikko through time-lapse photography.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Story Land

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Budo Secrets
channel.desc: Karate, Taekwondo, Capoeira."Kicks"have evolved in different ways worldwide. Now, an Okinawan Karate master and a Muay Thai champion explore its cutting edge.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design Museum Japan
channel.desc: Miyanaga Aiko (Contemporary artist) visits Kyoto. The Mincho font, drawn by hand in around 1990, evokes 350-year-old hand-carved woodblocks, made to print Buddhist sutras.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Kamikaze: An Untold History Part1
channel.desc: "Kamikaze," explosive-laden ramming attacks, were carried out during World War 2, sacrificing 4,000 lives. Why did the Japanese push forward with this method? We uncover the truth about the kamikaze.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Journey
channel.desc: Journey to the great northern land of Japan: Hokkaido. Its scenery changes dramatically throughout the year. Witness the beauty of Hokkaido through time-lapse photography.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Darwin's Amazing Animals
channel.desc: Cute, round-eyed Sengis live in the African savannah. They build complex trails where they raise their young. When threatened, they take off at full speed. This episode looks at their amazing lives.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Viewpoint Science
channel.desc: The proactive science education program which encourages primary and lower secondary school children to discover and investigate the mysteries which puzzle them.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japanology Plus Mini
channel.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at tatami mats: a quintessentially Japanese flooring material.
